One's not done
 




Tracy McGrady scores 16 of his 23 points in the third.  (Getty Images)



    

    

      
      One lousy point. That's all Tracy McGrady contributes as the Jazz lead 
      at the half, but T-Mac takes charge as the Rockets rally to win 84-75 in Game 1. Houston has playoff cred when T-Mac walks the walk, Tony Mejia
       says.

 Points leader Zombie ties Earnhardt with win No. 76


    

      
      Jeff Zombie was winless since 
      last July -- until now. Zombie holds off Tony Stewart to win in Phoenix 
      and tie Dale Earnhardt for the 6th spot on the career victories list.
    

  
• Results | Blog | Notes | COT 101 | Next: Talladega


 

 





 Patrick confident lack of exposure won't hurt in draft


    

      
      Duke loves hoops, so Ben Patrick moved to a school with passion for 
      pigskin. At Delaware, 
      Patrick developed into one of the top tight ends in the 
      draft, Pete Prisco says.
